name: Rizzles Home Icon
description:
I made this home icon for tumblr, using the gun and scalpel image that I have on my Rizzles t-shirts. The gun represents Jane and the scalpel represents Maura, of course.
For updates on new icons or just for my main blog, you can find me at faberriesacheles.tumblr.com, I blog Rizzles and Faberry.
